hero.name: Bevin Benet
hero.heading: I’m Bevin Benet
hero.description: I love solving problems. Trying to learn new things always. Data Science Student, Martial Artist, and a Tech Enthusiast.

about.title: I AM AVAILABLE FOR ANY CODING PROJECTS
about.description: I am a professional developer with experience in this field. I can create any website, web application or AI related project. I am also a data science student and a martial artist. I love to solve problems and learn new things. I am always available for any coding projects. Feel free to contact me. Currently working on Agentic AI projects.

items.title: Agentic AI
items.details: Expert in setting up agentic AI systems: Open AI SDK, Langraph, Crew AI — Currently exploring the frontiers of AI!

items.title: Languages
items.details: I can fluently juggle between English, Malayalam, and Hindi—language skills leveled up!

items.title: Coding
items.details: I code fluently in Python, C, C++, R, Kotlin, and PHP—consider these my superpowers!

items.title: Databases
items.details: I juggle databases like a pro: MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite, and MongoDB—pick your favorite, and I’ve got it covered!

items.title: Web Development
items.details: I'm your go-to for web magic: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, WordPress, Strapi, ReactJS, NodeJS, and jQuery—let's bring ideas to life online!

items.title: Miscellaneous
items.details: A mix of skills to tackle anything: Arduino,Android Studio, PowerPoint, Cloud Computing, Git, teaching, and training

items.title: Interfacing with the Arduino
items.details: Awarded by the University of California, Irvine (Coursera Certificate).

items.title: Similarity Score Estimation
items.details: Similarity Score Estimation of Kata Movement in Martial Arts Using LSTM and DTW presented at ICAECT 2023, Sacred Heart College.(Google Book)

items.title: Privacy Preserving ML(Review Paper)
items.details: Privacy Preserving Machine Learning: A Study on the Methods and Trends presented at VIGYAAN’22, NIMIT, Thrissur.

items.title: GPU Programming
items.details: GPU Programming and Distributed Deep Learning with PyTorch organized by the Department of Computer Science, CUSAT.

items.title: Building Interactive Dashboards with Grafana
items.details: Workshop at DevFest 2024, organized by Google Developer Groups, Cochin.

details.title: Quest AI
details.description: This is a web app that leverages Optical Character Recognition (OCR) technology to extract text from textbook images. This extracted text is then fed into a generative AI model (Gemini), which tailors a question set based on user specifications. Libraries such as ReportLab facilitate the arrangement of these questions into a standardized question paper format. Users can define parameters like the number of pages, question types, quantity, and layout. This solution fills a unique niche in the educational technology landscape.

details.title: Smile Detector
details.description: This is an application that takes photos when a person smiles in front of the camera. It was created in Pytorch. I uses computer vision to detect the person smililing. This phot is then converted into a cartoonised format and is returned to the user.

details.title: ICAECT 2023 website
details.description: This is the website that was created for ICAECT 2023, which was an international conference conducted at Sacred Heart College, Thevara. It was hosted at the college server.It was created using Wordpress.

details.title: Blitzkrieg 2024 Fest website
details.description: This is the website that was created for blitzkrieg fest 2024 conducted by the Department of Computer Science, Sacred Heart College, Thevara. I was hosted in github.

details.title: Sacred Heart Automated Time Table Announcer
details.description: It is an arduino based project thet announces the time table. It uses time RTC module, arduino UNO and speakers for announcing

allExperience.companyDescription: Kirel Creations is a branding agency that helps businesses create brands that are strong, memorable, and enduring. We understand that branding is more than just creating a logo or a website. It's about creating a holistic experience that connects with your target audience on an emotional level.

Age friendly is a club where the students take initiative and teach the elderly which includes computer and other language subjects. The students also conduct differerent cultural events in college for both the elderly and the other students in the college to take part in.
